name: Dodge The Crocks !
description:
UPDATE :

Added  HOT ! powerup

Tweaked the game

Cleaned The code

Added some features

The crocks gang is on the road to get you ! Dodge them and survive as long as possible !

Use arrows to move.

Tell your best score in the comments !

(This is my first game , also don't ask why your player is Bogdanov)

Made with Godot Engine 3.3.2
